title: Which exoplanet in the TRAPPIST-1 system could be habitable? Scientists are modeling the star to find out
description: Frequent flares from the nearby star TRAPPIST-1 could offer new clues in the search for habitable planets beyond Earth.
content: Frequent flares from the nearby star TRAPPIST-1 could offer new clues in the search for habitable planets beyond Earth.
